creator: XmobiTea Family
descriptionHtml:
🎉Chinese Chess Online - Tram Tuong - Become the number one King with millions of players all over the world.

1️⃣ Is a 100% online game, no bot, the opponent is a real player corresponding to the level.
2️⃣ There is a world messaging system that helps you communicate with other players quickly
3️⃣ Play free.
4️⃣ Extremely good connection - Good quality.
5️⃣ Create a private room to play with friends.
6️⃣ The system to open the gift chest and the spin lucky wheel brings many great rewards.
7️⃣ Music in the game relaxes you.
8️⃣ The achievement system, daily quests are extremely rich.
9️⃣ Fast support and response.
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

INTRODUCE
Including 2 games of Chinese Chess are Xiangqi mode and Jeiqi mode, this is a chess application characterized by Vietnamese culture, where talented men and talented players converge on the opening, middle and final battle.

FEATURE
🔶 Play free online chess.
🔶 Beautiful graphics bring a comfortable feeling.
🔶 There is an Elo point player ranking system, smart matching, helping players easily find an opponent with their own level.
🔶 Friendly friend mechanism, linking facebook friends, allowing players to invite their friends to join in simple chess.

SUPPORT & COMMENTS
👉 Homepage: https://xmobitea.com
👉 Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/TramTuongVN

NOTE
♦ Chinese Chess Online - Tram Tuong is an online Xiangqi and Jeiqi game, therefore requires an internet connection to use.
♦ This game is only for adult players.
descriptionShort: Kill thousands of enemies - become the number one King in the chess world!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fix disconnect.
Optimize game.
Fix bug can not end game.
Fix some other bugs.

New features:
Add play now button.
Add get free coin button.
Add detail chest box.
Add quick chat in room.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version, we include:
- New graphic for the chess board and chess.
- Implement new function report the user use tool hack, tool cheat.
- Display color chess that they are using.
- Split 2 mode Xiangqi and Jeiqi when choose the room.
- Upgrade easy invite friend join room.
- Change the time for fast mode is 30 seconds and slow mode is 60 seconds.
Fix some bugs
